item.title: Png Reader in Zig
item.description: Although there is already a solid zigimg image loading library it didn’t quite tick all the checkboxes for me. It doesn’t provide the flexibility that I am aiming for and it is using far more allocations than is necessary. Also since I already wrote a png reader in DLang it felt like a good project for learning zig to try to reimplement it and try to improve on my original design.
